member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilVariable.GetBackingStore
member.summary: Get a pointer to a variable that contains depth-stencil state.
member.param: Index into an array of depth-stencil-state descriptions. If there is only one depth-stencil variable in the effect, use 0.
A pointer to a depth-stencil-state description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilVariable.GetDepthStencilState
member.summary: Get a pointer to a depth-stencil interface.
member.param: Index into an array of depth-stencil interfaces. If there is only one depth-stencil interface, use 0.
The address of a pointer to a blend-state interface (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilVariable
member.summary: A depth-stencil-variable interface accesses depth-stencil state.
